channel.title: fx-control on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in fx-control on Fore Documentation

item.title: <fx-control>
item.description: Description fx-control is no concrete control displayed in the browser but instead wraps such a control and binds it to a data node in the model with the help of a ref attribute. Attributes Name Description Default context XPath reference pointing to parent context incopeContext debounce optional numeric value in milliseconds to delay input events - label optional label - ref XPath reference pointing to the bound node - updateEvent optional event name when to trigger updating of bound node.
